content: this is a pattern to make your very own finch plushie the finished products measures about 15 inches from top to bottom and about 10 inches across with the arms down at the sides i used the sweet snuggles yarn for mine approximately one skein of color #1 for the body and face one skein of color #2 for the headpatch and arms and a small amount of color #3 for the beak and feet you could make this with a worsted weight yarn and smaller hook to make a smaller version of your finch other materials stuffing safety eyes i used 30mm
